page.title: 16EMPLOYMENT
page.content: Most people where we live go to work in London.This is not because there is no work here,the reason is there are only factory jobs here. My dad works in London in a bank he goes by train.He has a car,but in London there is nowhere to park it. He leaves for work at about a quarter to eight and gets home at six. He is usually very tired when he gets home. My mum goes to work at Purfleet school where she works as dinner lady.She goes to school by pushbike. My mum complains sometimes because she thinks my dad earns more than she does for doing less work.
